data.title: New Testament in unrelated films?
data.meta_description: I really want to watch some films that explicitly riff on New Testament events/verses/speeches, but which aren't 'New Testament Movies,' like Jesus of Montreal, Passion of the Christ, etc. The...
data.text:
About Ask MetaFilter

Ask MetaFilter is a question and answer site that covers nearly any question on earth, where members help each other solve problems. Ask MetaFilter is where thousands of life's little questions are answered.
